price: (78) Blessed is the name of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.
arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱسۡمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: tabāraka us'mu rabbika dhī al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
